abstract: An exciting qualifying session with a mixture of action at the front and some cars taking a break, there was also a controversy between Lewis Hamilton and two other drivers.
snippet: An exciting qualifying session with a mixture of action at the front and some cars taking a break, there was also a controversy between Lewis Hamilton and two other drivers.
lead_paragraph: SUZUKA, Japan - We finally we had an interesting qualifying session for the front-runners. Never mind that Sebastian Vettel took the pole position again, his 12th in the 15 possible this season. The last laps of the session were worth the wait to watch the suspense as the leading drivers crossed the line probably the thickness of a sheet of paper apart: Jenson Button, who was fastest in every one of the three practice sessions this weekend, lost the pole position to Vettel by a few thousandths of a second.

headline.main: Sweet and Sour Suzuka Qualifying Session
